articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: The Coast Guard seized a record 76,000 pounds of drugs this summer off Central and South America - ABC News
articles.description: The U.S. Coast Guard says it seized a record 76,000 pounds of drugs this summer off Central and South America
articles.content: MIAMI -- The U.S. Coast Guard seized more than 75,000 pounds (34,000 kilograms) of illegal drugs this summer from boats far out to sea in the Pacific and Caribbean, which the service called its large… [+1287 chars]
